title: Main support, looking for an adc to climb the "ladder"
body: Need an adc to go up ranks, since I am a support. I can always carry games

replies.body: I'm an ADC main, but it looks like you're on EUW, these are the OCE forums and I'm on OCE

I main supp and trust me eventually you will regret it, hard to carry games as a support. no matter how good you are you can't carry a game full of toxic and greedy people :3, best of luck finding an ADC

Ty mate, sometimes there are.good teams and adc..
But mostly there are bad teams and trollers and.toxics...
Gl for you 2 mate
